landingPage.title: Let us know youâ€™re fit to sail
landingPage.description: All our Sailors must complete a pre-departure health form. Honestly, it's quick and easy.

healthQuestions.title: Question 1
healthQuestions.question: Have you tested positive for Covid-19 in the last 10 days?

healthQuestions.title: Question 2
healthQuestions.question: Do you currently have any of the following symptoms: fever, chills, feverishness, cough, shortness of breath,  difficulty breathing, sore throat, fatigue, muscle or body aches, headache, congestion or runny nose, new loss of taste or smell?

healthQuestions.title: Question 3
healthQuestions.question: Have you had contact with anyone suspected of being or diagnosed as having Covid-19, or who is currently subject to health monitoring for possible exposure to Covid-19 in the past 10 days?

healthQuestions.title: Question 4
healthQuestions.question: Have you had any medical conditions that could be classified as Extremely Vulnerable (e.g. recent organ transplant, chemotherapy, antibody treatment, radiotherapy, sickle cell):

healthQuestions.title: Question 5
healthQuestions.question: In the last 72 hours have you had any symptoms such as diarrhea, nausea or vomiting (with fever, headache)?

healthQuestions.title: Final Question
healthQuestions.question: Will you be more than 24 weeks pregnant by the end of your voyage?

questionsPage.healthContract:
If you answered “YES” to any of these questions, you’ll be assessed free of charge by a member of our shipboard medical staff. You’ll be allowed to travel — unless you’re suspected of having an illness that causes a public health concern.

The information in this questionnaire may be reported to the relevant Public Health Authorities, and penalties may apply to any individual who knowingly and willfully makes a false, fictitious or fraudulent statement or representation.

I certify that the above declaration is true and correct and understand that any dishonest answers may have serious public health implications

travelParty.title: Cabin mates
travelParty.description: Let us know your cabin mates are healthy by completing the form on their behalf.
travelParty.alreadySignedTitle: These Sailors have already declared their health status. You can (technically) overwrite it, but you should probably check with them before doing so.

questionsPage.confirmationQuestion: I acknowledge, accept and agree to abide by the terms of the contract.

healthCheckRefusePage.description: We're going to need you to fill out that health form before moving on. But don't worry, it wont take long at all.
healthCheckRefusePage.title: Nooot so fast, Sailor.
